snippet: The Turkish Parliament on Saturday amended an army regulation that had paved the way for military intervention in politics.
abstract: Turkish Parliament moves to curb military intervention in politics by rewriting regulation so that it restricts army to 'defending the Turkish nation against external threats and dangers.'
lead_paragraph: The Turkish Parliament on Saturday amended an army regulation that had paved the way for military intervention in politics.

headline.main: Turkish Lawmakers Move to Curb Army’s Political Power
headline.print_headline: Turkish Lawmakers Move to Curb Army’s Political Power
